backend/main.mo: Defines the actor’s core domain types for repairs, assistance, verification, documents, disputes, memberships, revenue, and mechanic/garage data, including authorization and blob-storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for various frontend files including components, pages, and libraries.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/style layers defining OKLCH theme variables, light/dark modes, and global element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures app routing, layout, navigation, and page components using TanStack Router.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRoute: Route guard that checks admin status and handles redirects or loading skeletons.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal that prompts authenticated users without a profile to enter name, email, and select roles, then saves the profile.
frontend/src/components/booking/GarageBo: Garage booking modal with tabs for details, assistance, and payment, requiring sign‑in and handling waiver confirmation.
frontend/src/components/booking/Mechanic: UI card for toggling mechanic assistance and specifying service type and details.
frontend/src/components/booking/PricingB: Displays a pricing summary including base price, addons, discounts, and total.
frontend/src/components/coming-soon/Comi: Badge component showing a 'Coming Soon' label with an icon.
frontend/src/components/coming-soon/Simu: Modal that simulates multi‑step flows with progress, completion state, and a coming‑soon notice.
frontend/src/components/common/Typograph: Provides PageTitle and SectionTitle components for consistent typography styling.
frontend/src/components/diy/DIYSupportMo: Authenticated DIY support modal offering tool recommendations, cost estimator, and consultation tabs.
frontend/src/components/diy/RepairCostEs: Form for creating repair cost estimates and viewing recent estimates, validating input and sending mutations.
frontend/src/components/diy/ToolRecommen: Renders a repair-type selector and shows recommended tools and consumables based on selected category, with an option to save the selection.
frontend/src/components/diy/VideoConsult: Displays a coming-soon video consultation feature with details, pricing, and a simulated booking flow modal.
frontend/src/components/garages/GarageCa: Shows a garage’s location, rates, and tools, and navigates to the garage detail page when clicked.
frontend/src/components/garages/GarageFi: Provides filter inputs for garage search including location, hourly price range, and requirement checkboxes.
frontend/src/components/garages/GaragePh: Displays a grid of garage photos with a modal viewer and navigation controls for browsing images.
frontend/src/components/layout/PageLayou: Wraps children in a responsive container with configurable max-width.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopNav.ts: Renders the top navigation bar with links, user menu, role-based dashboard options, and mobile navigation.
frontend/src/components/mechanics/Mechan: Displays mechanic details including name, location, rate, rating, and specializations, and navigates to their profile.
Provides filter controls for mechanics including location, specialization, rate range, and verification status.
Displays a badge showing a mechanic’s verification status with different icons and colors for verified, pending, or rejected.
frontend/src/components/payments/Payment: Renders a payment method selector with card, Apple Pay, and Google Pay options, triggering a simulated flow for unsupported methods.
frontend/src/components/reviews/ReviewLi: Shows a list of reviews with star ratings and timestamps, or a fallback message when no reviews exist.
frontend/src/components/uploads/FileUplo: Provides a file upload button with validation, simulated progress, and callbacks for selected files.
frontend/src/components/waivers/WaiverSi: Modal allowing users to read a waiver and sign by entering their name and agreeing to terms.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, providing login, logout, and identity context to components.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for user profiles, admin checks, tool recommendations, and repair estimates using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base layers and defines extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/types.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces and enums for garage listings, mechanic profiles, reviews, and search filters.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AccessDenied.tsx: Displays an access denied message with a card layout and a link back to the homepage.
frontend/src/pages/admin/DemandHeatmap.t: Admin page placeholder showing a card stating that no demand data is available.
frontend/src/pages/admin/DisputeTools.ts: Admin page placeholder for dispute resolution, indicating no active disputes.
frontend/src/pages/admin/FeaturedBoostMa: Admin page displaying a placeholder for managing featured boost requests.
frontend/src/pages/admin/InsuranceReview: Admin page placeholder indicating no insurance documents are pending review.
frontend/src/pages/admin/MarketplaceMode: Admin moderation page with tabs for mechanics and garages, each showing no pending items.
frontend/src/pages/admin/NoShowPenalties: Admin page placeholder showing that no no‑show penalties are recorded.
frontend/src/pages/admin/RevenueTracking: Admin dashboard showing revenue totals, breakdowns, and fee configuration using query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/admin/ReviewModeratio: Admin page with tabs for moderating mechanic and garage reviews, currently showing no pending reviews.
frontend/src/pages/admin/UserRoleManagem: Admin page describing the application's role system and restrictions on admin role assignment.
frontend/src/pages/admin/VerificationQue: Displays identity verification submissions and allows admins to approve or reject them with optional notes.
frontend/src/pages/admin/WaitlistManagem: Shows a simple waitlist management page with no entries displayed.
frontend/src/pages/admin/WaiverRecords.t: Provides a page for viewing waiver records, currently showing no available records.
frontend/src/pages/coming-soon/Unsupport: Lists upcoming features with preview simulations and a modal to show step-by-step mock flows.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/AdminDashb: Provides an admin dashboard linking to various moderation, management, and analytics tools.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/CustomerDa: Shows customer actions and summaries including bookings, reviews, assistance requests, and disputes.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/GarageOwne: Displays garage owner tools for managing listings, availability, and rental requests.
frontend/src/pages/dashboards/MechanicDa: Shows mechanic tools for managing profiles, availability, emergency settings, and incoming assistance requests.
frontend/src/pages/disputes/Disputes.tsx: Displays user disputes or prompts login if unauthenticated, showing either dispute count or a no‑disputes message.
frontend/src/pages/fix-my-car/FixMyCarIn: Collects issue descriptions and media uploads, validates input, and navigates to results after a simulated submission.
frontend/src/pages/fix-my-car/FixMyCarRe: Shows repair cost estimates and links to browse mechanics or garage rentals based on the user’s issue.
Searches and filters available garages, offering list and placeholder map views with loading skeletons.
Displays detailed garage info including pricing, tools, rules, photos, and reviews, with booking and DIY support modals.
frontend/src/pages/garages/GarageListing: Placeholder page indicating the garage listing editor is coming soon.
frontend/src/pages/Landing.tsx: Implements the landing page with hero content, feature cards, and navigation links for core actions.
frontend/src/pages/mechanics/MechanicBro: Searches and filters mechanics, showing results or loading skeletons based on query state.
frontend/src/pages/mechanics/MechanicPro: Placeholder page indicating the mechanic profile editor is coming soon.
Displays a simple public mechanic profile view with an ID and link back to browsing.
frontend/src/pages/settings/MembershipSe: Shows membership status for signed‑in users with details for DIY and Pro tiers or prompts login if unauthenticated.
frontend/src/pages/trust-safety/Identity: React page that shows identity verification UI, prompting sign-in if unauthenticated and displaying current verification status with an upload button.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them from the URL or session.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme colors, container settings, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: JSON file describing the project’s current state, requirements, features, issues, and architectural notes for the marketplace app.
